urls.title: European Air Quality Index
urls.description: NEW MOBILE APP AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOAD --- How clean is the air you‚Äôre breathing right now? How does the air in your city compare with that of a neighbouring city or region? Air pollution is the single largest environmental health risk in Europe. The European Environment Agency's European Air Quality Index allows users to understand more about air quality where they live. Displaying up-to-the-minute data for the whole of Europe, users can gain new insights into the air quality of individual countries, regions and cities.
